						<!-- T√≠tulo --><div class="card-header" id="atencion-en-linea"><button class="btn btn-link" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapse-atencion-en-linea" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="atencion-en-linea"><h4>Atenci√≥n en l√≠nea</h4><em class="ico icon-ic_expand_more_48px"></em></button></div>
						<!-- Sub√≠tulo --><div id="collapse-atencion-en-linea" class="collapse" aria-labelledby="headingOne" data-parent="#footer-acordion"><div class="card-body"><ul><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/recarga">Recarga</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/venta-telefonicaa">Venta tel√©fonica: 01 8000 911 008</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/conoce-tu-factura">Conoce tu factura</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/footer/directorio-telefonico">Directorio telef√≥nico</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/medidor-de-velocidad">Medici√≥n de servicio de datos</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/movistar-preferencial">Movistar Preferencial</a></li><li><a href="http://www.movistar.co/centro-de-proteccion-de-datos-personales-y-seguridad">Centro de protecci√≥n de Datos Personales y Seguridad</a></li></ul></div></div></div>

					<!-- FIN Legales --></div></section>

$Controller("ueeTplFormGadget",{
    initMethod:function($Gadget, $Meta){
        $Gadget.$GetProperty = function(model) {
            if ($Meta.property) {
                return $Meta.property + "." + model;
            }
        }
        
        $Gadget.$GetValue = function(exp) {
            return this.$eval(exp);
        }
        
        $Gadget.$GetFieldValue = function(field){
            var signalValField = ['text', 'textarea', 'datetime', 'password', 'date'];
            var fieldValue = this.$eval(this.$GetProperty(field.property));
            
            if ($.inArray(field.type, signalValField) != -1) {
                   if (field.type == 'datetime'){
                       return $Gadget.$Get("$filter")("tz")(fieldValue, $UEE.i18n('UEE.DATETIME.DEFAULT'));
                   } else if (field.type == "date"){
                       return $Gadget.$Get("$filter")("tz")(fieldValue, $UEE.i18n('UEE.DATE.DEFAULT'));
                   } else if (field.type == "password"){
                       return "‚óè‚óè‚óè‚óè‚óè‚óè";
                   } else {
                       return fieldValue;
                   }
                   
                } else {
                    
                    var fieldItems = $Gadget.items[field.property];
                    // get the key's value eg:select radio
                    if (!angular.isArray(fieldValue)) {
                        for (var i in fieldItems) {
                            if (fieldItems[i].key == fieldValue) {
                                return fieldItems[i].value;
                            }
                        }
                    } else { // checkbox muti-value
                        var vals = [];
                        $.each(fieldValue, function(index, val){
                            for (var j in fieldItems){
                                if (val == fieldItems[j].key){
                                    vals.push(fieldItems[j].value);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                        
                        return vals.join(",");
                    }
                    
             }
        }
        
        // Support id set dynamic variables eg: hello{{$Gadget.$Attrs.id}} => hello001
        $Gadget.$MetaIdValue = function(id, property, $item) {
            if (id) {
                return $Gadget.$Get('$interpolate')(id)($Gadget) + ($item ? $item.key:'');
            } else {
                if ($Gadget.$Meta.id) {
                    return  $Gadget.$Get('$interpolate')($Gadget.$Meta.id)($Gadget) +"_"+ property + ($item ? "_" +$item.key:'');
                } else {
                    return "";
                } 
            }
        }
        
        // Support label property set dynamic variables
       $Gadget.$MetaLabelText = function (field, $UEE) {
                var ret, results = "";
                if(field && field.label) {
                    if (field.label.substring(0, 1) == "$"){
                        ret = $Gadget.$eval(field.label) || "";
                    } else {
                        ret = field.label || "";
                    }
                    var lbs = ret.split("&");
                    for (var i = 0; i < lbs.length; i++){
                        // Upfront/Total Upfront/MonthFee Unit
                        if (field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cunrencytype" 
                            || field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.itemtotalfee"
                                || field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cycleFee") {
                        	results += $UEE.i18n($.trim(lbs[i]), [$Gadget.$parent.$Gadget.currencySymbol]);
                        } else {
                        	results += $UEE.i18n($.trim(lbs[i]));
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                return results;
           }
        
        // Support disabled property set dynamic variables
        $Gadget.$MetaDisableText = function(field) {
            if (angular.isString(field.disabled)) {
                return field.disabled;
            } else {
                return "$MetaField.disabled";
            }
        }
        
        // Support validator property set dynamic variables
        $Gadget.$MetaValidateText = function (field) {
            // this variable is used u-validator, because u-validator config only support {{variable}}
            $Gadget.tempvalidator = "";
            // if validator start with $ ,so the meta validator as variable ; this method is bad
            if (angular.isString(field.validator) && field.validator.substring(0,1) == "$") {
                $Gadget.tempvalidator = $Gadget.$eval(field.validator);
                return field.validator;
            } else {
                $Gadget.tempvalidator = field.validator;
                return "$MetaField.validator";
            }
        }
        
        // Support timeComparator('bt{{$Gadget.$parent.$Attrs.xx}}') for json meta; only date datetime password
        $Gadget.$MetaValidateValue = function(validator) {
            if (validator && validator.indexOf("{{") != -1){
                return $Gadget.$Get('$interpolate')(validator)($Gadget);
            } else {
                return validator;
            }
            
        }
        
         // Support validator property set dynamic variables
         $Gadget.$MetaViewModeText = function (field) {
             
            // the viewmode is expression  eg: 1 == 1 or $Page.viewmode == 'view'
            if (typeof (this.$eval(field.viewmode)) == 'boolean') {
                return this.$eval(field.viewmode);
            }
         
            // the viewmode is dynamic variables
            if (field.viewmode && field.viewmode.substring(0,1) == "$") {
                return this.$eval(field.viewmode) == 'view' ? true : false ;
            } else {
                return field.viewmode == 'view' ? true : false;
            }
        }
        
        // because outside varibale needs to control required signal, therefore write this method 
        $Gadget.$GetRequriedSignal = function (field) {
            var validatorText = field.validator;
            if (!validatorText) {
                return "";
            }
            if (validatorText.substring(0,1) ==  '$') {
               var validator = this.$eval(validatorText);
               return validator && validator.indexOf('required') != -1 ? "*" : "";
            } else {
               return validatorText.indexOf('required') != -1 ? "*" : "";
            }
        }
        
        // the reason of define this function is the business may be configd display as variable
        $Gadget.$GetDisplayVal = function (field, attrName){
            // display is varibale, eg: display:'$Page.xxx'
            if (angular.isString(field[attrName])){
                return this.$eval(field[attrName]) == undefined ? true : this.$eval(field[attrName]);
            } else {
                return (field[attrName] !== false);
            }
        }
        
        this.initFieldItems($Meta, $Gadget);
    },
    
    initFieldItems : function ($Meta, $Gadget) {
        if (!$Meta) {
            return;
        }
        !$Gadget.items && ($Gadget.items = {});
        !$Meta.fields && ($Meta.fields = []);
        for (var i = 0 ; i < $Meta.fields.length; i++) {
            var field = $Meta.fields[i];
            if (angular.isArray(field.items)){
                $Gadget.items[field.property] = field.items;
            } else if (angular.isString(field.items) && field.items.substring(0,1) == '$') {
                $Gadget.items[field.property] = $Gadget.$eval(field.items);
            }
        }
        this.initDictCode($Meta, $Gadget);
    },
    
    initDictCode : function($Meta, $Gadget) {
     // collect dictCodes from json meta
        var dictCodes = [] , dictCode;
        for (var i = 0; i < $Meta.fields.length; i++){
            var field = $Meta.fields[i];
            if (field.hasOwnProperty('dictCode')) {
               // dictCodes.push($Meta.fields[i].dictCode);
               if (angular.isString(field.dictCode) && field.dictCode.substring(0,1) == '$') {
                    dictCode = $Gadget.$eval(field.dictCode);
                    if (dictCode){
                    	dictCodes.push(dictCode);
                    }
                } else {
                    dictCodes.push(field.dictCode);
                } 
            }
        }

        if (dictCodes.length > 0){
            var $Fire = $Gadget.$Get('$Fire');
            $Fire({
                service:"/bes/artificial/common/datadictbo/querydatadict",
                params :{
                    req : {
                    	dictCodeList : dictCodes // eg : ['Code1','Code2']
                    }
                },
                target : '$Gadget.data.datadicts',
                onafter:function($Gadget){
                    for (var j = 0; j < $Meta.fields.length; j++){
                        var field = $Meta.fields[j];
                        if (field.hasOwnProperty('dictCode')){
                        	var dictInfoLists = ($Gadget.data.datadicts.dataDictMap[dictCode ? dictCode : field.dictCode] || {}).dataDictInfoList;
                        	if (field.filterFn){
                            	// need to consider the functions carried namespace scenarios. eg: $Controller.namespance.functionName
                        		var namespaces = field.filterFn.split(".");
                        		var func = namespaces.pop();
                        		var contextFn = namespaces.length == 0 ? window[func] : window.eval(namespaces.join("."))[func];
                        		$Gadget.items[field.property] = $Gadget.$Get('$filter')('filter')(dictInfoLists,contextFn);
                        	} else {
                        		$Gadget.items[field.property] = dictInfoLists;
                        	}
                       	}
                     }
                } // end onafter
                
            }, $Gadget);
        } // end if
    }
});
        
;
//undefined

    $Controller("ueeTplTableGadget", {
        initMethod: function($Gadget) {
            // Get the corresponding key value for checkbox or radio
            $Gadget.$GetValue = function(model){
                return this.$eval("$Rowdata." + model);
            }
            
            $Gadget.$GetEprValue =  function (disabledEpr) {
                return this.$eval(disabledEpr);
            }
            
            // Get the corresponding property value for business data
            $Gadget.$GetBindVal = function($Rowdata, $MetaItem){
                var bind = this.$eval("$MetaItem.property");
                if ($MetaItem.filter) {
                    var regs = $MetaItem.filter.split(":");
                    var filterName = regs.shift() , filterFn;
                    try {
                        filterFn = this.$Get('$filter')(filterName);
                    }catch(e){
                        return "";
                    }
                    
                    // if param startwith '$' it is variable  It supports only one variable parameter; eg: filterName:$Gadget.dictkeys
                    if (regs[0] && regs[0].substring(0, 1) == "$") {
                        return filterFn(this.$eval(bind, $Rowdata), $Gadget.$eval(regs[0]));
                    } else {
                        var sign = ',';
                        if($.trim(filterName) === 'tz') {
                            sign = ':';
                            var tempVal = parseInt(this.$eval(bind, $Rowdata));
                            return filterFn(tempVal, regs.join(sign));
                        } else {
                            return filterFn(this.$eval(bind, $Rowdata), regs.join(","));
                        }
                        
                    }
                } else {
                    return this.$eval(bind, $Rowdata);
                }
            }

			// ÂΩìÂâç$MetaItem‰∏∫‰ª∑Ê†ºÊó∂,Ê†πÊçÆÊúàÁßüÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Á©∫Êù•Âà§ÂÆöÊòØÂê¶ÈúÄË¶ÅclassÂ±ûÊÄßdis_inb
            $Gadget.$GetPreBindVal = function($Rowdata, $MetaItem){
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cycleFee") {
					return true;
                }
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.amount") {
					return true;
                }
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.itemtotalfee") {
					return true;
                }
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cunrencytype") {
    				return $Rowdata["newMonthFee"]!=null;
                }
                return null;
            }

			// Âà§Êñ≠ÊòØÂê¶ÈúÄË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÂΩìÂâçdiv
            $Gadget.$showDiv = function($Rowdata, $MetaItem){
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cycleFee") {
                	return $Rowdata["newMonthFee"]!=null;
                }
                if($MetaItem.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.itemtotalfee") {
                	return $Rowdata["totalPrice"]!=null;
                }
                return true;
            }
			
            // Whether to show the operation buttons
            $Gadget.$Display = function($MetaItem){
                if(typeof($MetaItem.display) != 'boolean'){
                       return this.$eval($MetaItem.display);
                }
                return $MetaItem.display;
            }
            
            // true, false, "$Page.name == 'xiaoming'"
            $Gadget.$BooleanValue = function(exp){
                if(typeof(exp) != 'boolean'){
                       return this.$eval(exp);
                }
                return exp;
            }
            
            // the reason of define this function is the business may be configd display as variable
            $Gadget.$GetDisplayVal = function (field){
                // display is varibale, eg: display:'$Page.xxx'
                if (angular.isString(field.display)){
                    return this.$eval(field.display) == undefined ? true : this.$eval(field.display);
                } else {
                    return (field.display !== false);
                }
            }
            
            $Gadget.$MetaLabelText = function (field, $UEE) {
                var ret, results = "";
                if(field && field.label) {
                    if (field.label.substring(0, 1) == "$"){
                        ret = $Gadget.$eval(field.label) || "";
                    } else {
                        ret = field.label || "";
                    }
                    var lbs = ret.split("&");
                    for (var i = 0; i < lbs.length; i++){
                        // Upfront/Total Upfront/MonthFee Unit
                        if (field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cunrencytype" 
                            || field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.itemtotalfee"
                                || field.label === "bes.shoppingcart.label.cycleFee") {
                        	results += $UEE.i18n($.trim(lbs[i]), [$Gadget.$parent.$Gadget.currencySymbol]);
                        } else {
                        	results += $UEE.i18n($.trim(lbs[i]));
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                return results;
           }


            $Gadget.$MetaTotalPriceText = function ($UEE) {
                debugger;
                return $UEE.i18n($.trim("bes.shoppingcart.label.itemtotalfee"), [$Gadget.$parent.$Gadget.currencySymbol]);
           }
            
            //  ['1', '2', '3'] to [{'key':'1', 'value': '1'}, {'key':'2', 'value': '2'}, {'key':'3', 'value': '3'}]
            $Gadget.$ToObjectArray = function (oldArray) {
                if(angular.isArray(oldArray)) {
                    return oldArray.map(function(item){
                        return {'key': item, 'value': item};
                    });
                }
                else {
                    return oldArray;
                }
           }
            
            // Calculate colspand when $Gadget.tdata is null
            $Gadget.$GetTdColspan = function(fields){
                var len = 0, _len = 0;
                if(fields && fields.length)
                {
                    for (var i = 0 ; i < fields.length; i++)
                    {
                        if (fields[i].display !== false){
                            len++;
                        }
                    }    
                }
                
                if ($Gadget.$Meta.check || $Gadget.$Meta.action) {
                    _len = 1;
                }
                
                if ($Gadget.$Meta.check && $Gadget.$Meta.action){
                    _len = 2;
                }
                
                return len + _len;
            }
            
            $Gadget.rowFilter = function(item) {
                return item.rowhide == undefined || item.rowhide == false;
            };
            
        }
    }); 
    ;
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">/**
 * ËØ•ÊÆµ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ∞Ü‰ºöË¢´ËøΩÂä†Âà∞ÊúÄÁªàhtmlÁöÑbodyÂêéÈù¢
 */
(function(window, angular){

    if(!angular){
        return;
    }

    var buildVersion = window.$UEE.version;
    var extensionExpr = /(js|css|html|uslx)$/;
    var getVersionUrl =  window.$UEE.getVersionUrl = function(url){
        url = url || "";
        if(!buildVersion){
            return url;
        }else{

            //already add version
            if(url.indexOf('?' + buildVersion) != -1){
                return url;
            }
            var searchPosion = url.indexOf("?");
            var extend;
            if(-1 != searchPosion){
                var urlPath = url.slice(0, searchPosion);
                extend = urlPath.split(".").pop();
                if(extensionExpr.test(extend.toLowerCase())){
                    url = urlPath + "?" + buildVersion + "&" + url.slice(searchPosion + 1);
                }
            }else{
                extend = url.split(".").pop();
                if(extensionExpr.test(extend.toLowerCase())){
                    url = url + "?" + buildVersion;
                }
            }
            return url;
        }
    }

    /*
     * travers resource.root to current webapp
     * */
    $UEE.travers = function(key){
        return (key ? key.replace("resource.root",("/" + window.location.pathname.split('/')[1])):undefined);
    }

    /**
     * directive `u-init-include` whitch generated by ubuild
     */
    angular.module('uee').directive('uInitInclude', ['$parse', function($parse){
        return {
            restrict: 'A',
            scope: true,
            compile: function compile(tElement, tAttrs, transclude) {
                return {
                    pre: function(scope, iElement, iAttrs, controller){

                        //Â¢ûÂä†ÂèÇÊï∞paramsÁöÑÊîØÊåÅ
                        if(iAttrs.params){
                            var getter = $parse(iAttrs.params);
                            var $Params = scope.$Params = angular.extend({}, scope.$Params, getter(scope));
                            // Similar as '$watchCollection:' in https://github.com/angular/angular.js/blob/master/src/ng/rootScope.js#L412
                            var changeDetected = 0;
                            iAttrs.params && scope.$watch(function $ParamsWatcher(){
                              var newParams = getter(scope);
                              for(var key in newParams){
                                // TODO(Derek), shall we copy step.params time by time?
                                if(angular.isObject(newParams[key]||$Params[key])){
                                    if(newParams[key] !== $Params[key]){
                                        $Params[key] = newParams[key];
                                        ++changeDetected;
                                    }
                                }
                              }
                              return changeDetected;
                            });
                        }

                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }]);

    /**
     * directive `u-init-gadget` whitch generated by ubuild
     */
    angular.module('uee').directive('uInitGadget', ['$compile', function($compile){
        return {
            restrict: 'A',
            scope: true,
            compile: function compile(tElement, tAttrs, transclude) {
                return {
                    pre: function(scope, iElement, iAttrs, controller){

                        // init $Meta for template gadget
                        var $Meta = {};
                        if(iAttrs.meta){
                            var meta = $UEE.$Meta[iAttrs.meta];
                            try{
                                $Meta = scope.$eval(meta.content);
                            }catch(e){
                                // when exception,we need to do nothing.
                            }

                            // if customer delete meta by composer,we hold meta script in page
                            // when upgrade page,we show need this gadget is delete,template gadget do not show if it's meta is deleted
                            if(meta && meta.status == "delete"){
                                return;
                            }
                        }

                        // var $scope = scope.$new();

                        //ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂèòÈáè
                        angular.extend(scope, {
                          $Gadget:scope,
                          $Attrs:iAttrs,
                          $Property:scope,
                          $Meta:$Meta,
                          $Path:$UEE.travers(iAttrs.path),
                          $Transclude:function(){
                              scope.$$Transcluded = true;
                              return $(tElement.context).clone();
                          }
                        });

                        // $compile(tElement.contents())($scope);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }]);

    /**
     * overwrite frontend gadget directive
     * support <div gadget name="bes:xxx"></div>
     */
    angular.module("uee.ui").directive("gadget", function($templateCache, $http, $compile, $rootScope, $UEE, $Fire, $META){
        return {
            template : '<div class="uee-gadget ng-hide"></div>',
            restrict : "A",
            replace : true,
            scope : true,
            transclude : false,
            compile : function(telement, tAttrs, linker){
                return function link($scope, element, attrs, controller, transcludeFn){
                    $scope.$on("$destroy", function(){
                        if(render){
                            render = null;
                        }
                        telement.removeData();
                        if($Gadget){
                            $Gadget.$destroy();
                        }
                        if(element && element.removeData){
                            element.removeData();
                            element.children().removeData();
                            element = null;
                        }
                    })
                    var $Gadget = $scope.$new();
                    $Gadget.$Gadget = $Gadget;
                    $Gadget.$Attrs = attrs;
                    $Gadget.$Property = $Gadget;
                    $Gadget.$Transclude = function(){
                        $Gadget.$$Transcluded = true;
                        return $(telement.context).clone();
                    }

                    // Get gadget name.
                    //support `<div heading="Hello!"  gadget="my:photoalbum"></div>`
                    var gadgetName = attrs.gadget;
                    if(gadgetName){
                        attrs.$observe("gadget", function(name){
                            if(name){
                                gadgetName = name.replace(":", "-");
                                render();
                            }
                        });
                    }else{
                        // For usage "<my:photoalbum heading="Hello!"  gadget>" , name is "my-photoalbum"
                        var namespace = telement.context.scopeName;
                        // for ie8, element nodeName do not contains namespace,we can get namespace from element'scopeName.
                        // and ie8 do not has attribute localName
                        if(namespace && !telement.context.localName){
                            gadgetName = [namespace, '-', telement.context.nodeName.toLowerCase()].join("");
                        }else{
                            gadgetName = telement.context.nodeName.toLowerCase().replace(":", "-");
                        }
                        render();
                    }

                    function render(){
                        // <my:photoalbum heading="Hello!" gadget> to be <div class="my-photoalbum  ....." ...>
                        attrs.$addClass(gadgetName);

                        // Load gadget file
                        var url = $UEE.$Gadgets.path($rootScope.$Webapp, gadgetName);
                        var token = $UEE.token();
                        // add token
                        if(token){
                            if(-1 == url.indexOf('?')){
                                url += ('?token=' + token);
                            }else{
                                url += ('&token=' + token);
                            }
                        }
                        $http.get(url, {cache:$templateCache}).success(function(content, status, headers, config){
                            if(content){
                                if(attrs.path){
                                    $Gadget.$Path = attrs.path;
                                }else if(headers("uee-gadget-url")){
                                    // $Path: "/uee/gadgets/my-photoalbum"
                                    $Gadget.$Path = $rootScope.$Webapp + headers("uee-gadget-url");
                                }else{
                                    //For IDE use
                                    $Gadget.$Path = url.substring(0, url.lastIndexOf("/"));
                                }

                                // render gadget content
                                $UEE.$Gadgets.render($Gadget, content, element, telement);

                                // load dictkey data
                                getDictValue();
                            }else{
                                console.error("Load gadget: cannot find gadget '" + gadgetName + "'")
                            }
                       });
                    }

                    function getDictValue(){
                        var dictKeys = $META.getDictKeys();
                        if(!dictKeys || dictKeys.length==0){
                            return;
                        }

                        var options = {
                                "service" : "meta/dictkey",
                                "param-dictkeylist" : dictKeys};
                        $Fire(options, $scope);

                        $META.clearDictKeys();
                    }
                };
            }//end compile
        };
    },true);

     var srcCaches;
    angular.module("uee.ui").directive("ueeScript", function($cacheFactory){

        //To prevent unnecessary js request and eval
        srcCaches = srcCaches || $cacheFactory("srcCaches");
        function syncLoadjs(src){
            jQuery.ajax({
               url: src,
               type: "GET",
               dataType: "script",
               async: false,
               global: false,
              "throws": true
            })
        }
        return {
            restrict : "E",
            transclude : "element",
            link : function($scope, element, attrs, controller, linker){
                linker($scope, function(clone){
                    $.globalEval(clone.text());
                    $(clone[0]).remove();
                });
                var src =  attrs.ngSrc || attrs.src;
                var srcCache = srcCaches.get(src);
                if(!srcCache && $.contains(document, element[0])){
                    src && syncLoadjs(src);
                    srcCaches.put(src, src);
                }

                // Update comment for checking:
                element[0].textContent = " ueeScript: src=" + src;
            }
        };
    }, true);

    angular.module("uee.ui").directive("uPage", ['$http', '$templateCache', '$anchorScroll', '$compile',  '$interpolate', '$timeout', '$location', '$log',
    function($http, $templateCache, $anchorScroll, $compile, $interpolate, $timeout, $location, $log){
        return {
            restrict: 'A',
            terminal: true,
            link: function(scope, element, attr) {
              var lastScope = null, changeCounter = 0;
              var includeStep = attr.uPage;
              var firstRenderStep = true;

              scope.$on("$UEE.Event.StepChangeSuccess", updateStepView);
              updateStepView();

              // Code for UEE business!
              function updateStepView(newView, oldView){
                  var startTime = (new Date()).getTime();
                  if(scope.$$destroyed){
                      clearContent();
                      return;
                  }

                  var step = scope.$Context.$Step,
                      viewExp = step && step.view || "",
                      view = $interpolate(viewExp)(scope),
                      thisChangeId = ++changeCounter;
                  if(!view){
                      return;
                  }

                  if(firstRenderStep){
                      var template = element.html();
                      $templateCache.put(view, template);
                      lastScope = scope.$new();
                      var link = $compile(element.contents());
                      link(lastScope);
                      firstRenderStep = false;
                      var endTime = (new Date()).getTime(),
                          costTime = endTime-startTime;
                      $log.log("<uee:page> Page loaded, Business=", scope.$Context.$Business.name, ", view=", view, "cost " + costTime + "ms");
                      return;
                  }else{
                      $http.get(view, {cache: $templateCache}).success(function(response) {
                          if (thisChangeId !== changeCounter) {
                              return;
                          }

                          // Derek: I don't know whether this is the best practice.
                          if(scope.$$destroyed){
                              clearContent();
                              return;
                          }

                          var template = response;
                          if(template){
                              lastScope && lastScope.$destroy();

                              element.html(template);

                              lastScope = scope.$new();

                              var link = $compile(element.contents());
                              link(lastScope);

                              // should not run $anchorScroll when popup a page with ueePage in it
                              if(element.closest("div.popwin").length == 0){
                                  $anchorScroll();
                              }
                          }else{
                              clearContent();
                          }
                      });
                  }
              }

              function destroyLastScope() {
                  if (lastScope) {
                    lastScope.$destroy();
                    lastScope = null;
                  }
              }

              function clearContent() {
                  element.empty();
                  destroyLastScope();
              }
            }
        };//end of return.
    }]);

    // ng-src, ng-href are interpolated
    angular.module("ng").directive("ngHref", function(){
        return {
            priority: 99, // it needs to run after the attributes are interpolated
            link: function(scope, element, attr) {
                var name = "href";
                if (Object.prototype.toString.call(element.prop('href')) === '[object SVGAnimatedString]') {
                    name = 'xlinkHref';
                    attr.$attr[name] = 'xlink:href';
                }
                attr.$observe("ngHref", function(value) {
                    if (!value) {
                        attr.$set(name, null);
                        return;
                    }
                    attr.$set(name, $.nodeName(element[0],"link") ? getVersionUrl(value) : value);
                });
            }
        }
    }, true);
    angular.module("ng").directive("ngSrc", function(){
        return {
            priority: 99, // it needs to run after the attributes are interpolated
            link: function(scope, element, attr) {
                var name = "src";
                attr.$observe("ngSrc", function(value) {
                    attr.$set(name, $.nodeName(element[0],"script") ? getVersionUrl(value) : value);
                });
            }
        }
    }, true);

    angular.module('uee').config(function($provide, $httpProvider){
        $provide.decorator('$httpBackend', ['$delegate', function($delegate) {
            var _http = $delegate;

            if(window.$UEE.version){
                _http = function(method, url, post, callback, headers, timeout, withCredentials, responseType){
                    if(arguments[0] === "GET"){
                        arguments[1] = window.$UEE.getVersionUrl(arguments[1]);
                    }
                    return $delegate.apply(this, arguments)
                }
            }
            return _http;
        }]);
    });

})(window, window.angular);</script>

<span ng-if=\"!$MetaViewModeText($MetaField)\" ng-switch=\"$MetaField.type\" class=\"ng-cloak\">\n        <!'+'-- edit mode --'+'>\n        <!'+'-- The type is textarea --'+'>\n        <div ng-if=\"$MetaField.script &amp;&amp; $MetaField.event\" class=\"ng-cloak\"><\/uee:fire>\n        <\/div>\n        \n        <!'+'-- The type is text --'+'>\n        <div class=\"form_control\" ng-switch-when=\"text\">\n            <input title=\"\" class=\"form_input\" id=\"{{$MetaIdValue($MetaField.id, $MetaField.property)}}\" ng-readonly=\"{{$MetaField.readonly}}\" placeholder=\"{{$MetaField.placeholder | i18n}}\" property=\"{{$GetProperty($MetaField.property)}}\" uee-xdyna=\"{{$MetaValidateText($MetaField)}}\" u-validator=\"{{$Gadget.tempvalidator}}\" ng-disabled=\"{{$MetaDisableText($MetaField)}}\">\n                <uee:fire event=\"{{$MetaField.event}}\" script=\"{{$MetaField.script}}\" ng-if=\"$MetaField.script &amp;&amp; $MetaField.event\" class=\"ng-cloak\"><\/uee:fire>\n            \n        <\/div>\n        \n        <!'+'-- The type is password --'+'>\n         <div class=\"form_control\" ng-switch-when=\"password\">\n            <input title=\"\" class=\"form_input\" id=\"{{$MetaIdValue($MetaField.id, $MetaField.property)}}\" type=\"password\" property=\"{{$GetProperty($MetaField.property)}}\" uee-xdyna=\"$MetaField.validator\" u-validator=\"{{$MetaValidateValue($MetaField.validator)}}\" ng-disabled=\"{{$MetaDisableText($MetaField)}}\">\n                 <uee:fire event=\"{{$MetaField.event}}\" script=\"{{$MetaField.script}}\" ng-if=\"$MetaField.script &amp;&amp; $MetaField.event\" class=\"ng-cloak\"><\/uee:fire>\n            \n        <\/div>\n        \n         <!'+'-- The type is datetime --'+'>\n        <div class=\"form_control\" ng-switch-when=\"datetime\">\n            <div class=\"ui-datetime\" displayformat=\"{{$MetaField.displayformat}}\" showweeks=\"{{$MetaField.showweeks}}\" uee-xdyna=\"$MetaField.validator\">\n                <input title=\"\" id=\"{{$MetaIdValue($MetaField.id, $MetaField.property)}}\" property=\"{{$GetProperty($MetaField.property)}}\" u-validator=\"{{$MetaValidateValue($MetaField.validator)}}\" ng-disabled=\"{{$MetaDisableText($MetaField)}}\">\n                <span><\/span>\n                <uee:fire event=\"{{$MetaField.event}}\" script=\"{{$MetaField.script}}\" ng-if=\"$MetaField.script&amp;&amp;$MetaField.event\" class=\"ng-cloak\"><\/uee:fire>\n            <\/div>\n        <\/div>\n        \n        <!'+'-- The type is date --'+'>\n        <div class=\"form_control\" ng-switch-when=\"date\">\n            <div class=\"ui-date\"
